txt.en: Haldis wishes for you to decorate the inside of Grimbeorn's lodge.\n\nYou should decorate the inside of the lodge with the lilies you collected.
Pond lilies can be found in ponds throughout the Beorning-lands.\n\nYou should collect pond lilies for Haldis.
'I am sure the lilies will brighten the hall! Dare I think the flowers might bring a smile even to old Grimbeorn himself? I do dare!'

'While I was walking sweet Honey-bell I saw the pond lilies in full bloom, and their loveliness left me amazed! Had I not been so exhausted by the walk, I might have picked some lilies to brighten Grimbeorn's hall. If you venture once again among the Vales, could I ask you to pick some of the lilies for me? The hall could use some decoration and some brightening both!'
Haldis can be found at the Beorninghús.\n\nYou should inform Haldis that the decorations are complete.
Haldis has seen the pond lilies in full bloom and wishes to bring joy to the Beorninghús.
